generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with white lane markings, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: The area on the right side of the road, separated by poles and where pedestrians are walking, is a sidewalk.
- building: There is a large stone building visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Trees with green and some autumn-colored leaves are visible in the background and along the street.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: Multiple individuals are visible walking across the road and sidewalk.
- truck: A large white truck with a "C&A" logo is visible on the left side of the image.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the right side of the image.
- traffic sign: A sign with the text "Linienverkehr frei" is visible on the right side of the image.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting the traffic light and traffic signs.
- car: A small silver car is visible in the distance on the road.
